name: Easymeeting Inc.
tag_list: cloud-conferencing, ipad-video-conferencing, video-meetings, videoconferencing, video-conferencing, multiparticipant-video, easymeeting-net, mobile-video
overview:
Easymeeting.net is a global videoconferencing as a service provider that makes it possible for traditional videoconferencing systems, PC’s, Mac’s, Tablets and smartphones to collaborate in multi participant video meetings together.

Our scalable services, designed with the user in mind, can be personalized to best meet the needs of your company, and are neatly bundled into an affordable monthly fee, the same way you pay internet and phone bills. We assist our customers in finding the right video systems for their company, or apply our services to the systems they already have. Easymeeting.net was founded in 2006 by Avikom AS, a leading Scandinavian Distributor of Audio and Video Conferencing Services. Easymeeting.net´s Global Headquarters are located in Tromsø,Norway, and it´s North American Headquarters in Mystic, Connecticut. Easymeeting.net also has offices Stockholm, Sweden, and strategic partners throughout the Americas, EMEA and APAC regions.

Why we believe in The Easymeeting.net way of life…

Here at Easymeeting we believe that time is one of our most important values. We strive to provide a technology that will save our customers both time and money and still give them the experience of successful, face to face, travel free meetings. Never has international business been so simple, affordable, and made so much sense as it does now with Easymeeting´s High Definition videoconferencing services at your fingertips.

We have developed our services and products with the ultimate user experience in mind, and if you do run into questions, our Easymeeting Experts are always available to help with your video meeting needs. We want to provide our customers with the tools necessary to have a meeting with a customer in Beijing in the morning, show a sales presentation to a potential client in London after lunch, and still make it home in time to enjoy dinner with their families. No more traffic, no more airport lines, and no more of your valuable time going to waste. We like to call it TIME WELL SPENT.

products.name: easyConference- virtual meeting room for multiparticipant videconferencing from video systems and mobile devices
